alert.note: Alert for Darke (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 10:17AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF PREBLE, NORTHWESTERN BUTLER AND DARKE COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 AM EDT... At 1017 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Union City to Liberty, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oxford, Greenville, Eaton, Versailles, Arcanum, Camden, Lewisburg, Union City, New Paris, West Alexandria, Ansonia, New Madison, Gratis, Webster, Wayne Lakes, Gettysburg, Eldorado, Verona, West Manchester and College Corner. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
